com.netflix.genie.common.internal.util

Class RegexDirectoryManifestFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.common.internal.util.RegexDirectoryManifestFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectoryManifest.Filter

    public class RegexDirectoryManifestFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements DirectoryManifest.Filter
    Implementation of DirectoryManifestFilter that filters manifest entries base on a list of regular expressions provided via properties class.
    Since:
    4.0.0

        Parameters:
        path - the file path
        attrs - the file attributes

      • includeDirectory

        public boolean includeDirectory(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attrs)
        Whether to include a given directory in the manifest. If a directory is not included, all sub-directories and files contained are also implicitly excluded.
        Specified by:
        includeDirectory in interface DirectoryManifest.Filter
        Parameters:
        path - the directory path
        attrs - the directory attributes
        Returns:
        true if the directory should be included in the manifest, false if it should be excluded.

      • walkDirectory

        public boolean walkDirectory(java.nio.file.Path path,
                             java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attrs)
        Whether to recurse into a given directory and add its contents to the manifest. Only evaluated if the directory is not excluded.
        Specified by:
        walkDirectory in interface DirectoryManifest.Filter
        Parameters:
        path - the directory path
        attrs - the directory attributes
        Returns:
        true if the contents of the directory should be included in the manifest, false if they should be excluded.
